name: ext_R2_ImplementationGuide_page
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.ImplementationGuide.page for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents ImplementationGuide.page from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ImplementationGuide|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: A page / section in the implementation guide. The root page is the implementation guide home page.
element.comment: `ImplementationGuide.page` maps to R4 `ImplementationGuide.manifest.page`. Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both
